catalog_script_client.name: Autofill details onChange

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_eb44e63b474331107b748a5f746d4397
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>true</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>true</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable/><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>true</isolate_script><messages/><name>Autofill details onChange</name><order/><published_ref/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) {
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') {
      return;
   }

   var requestedId = g_form.getValue('requested_for');

   var userDetails = new GlideRecord('sys_user');
   userDetails.addQuery('sys_id', g_user.userID);
   userDetails.query();

   while (userDetails.next()) {
	g_form.setValue('phone', userDetails.phone);
	g_form.setValue('email', userDetails.email);
	g_form.setValue('location', userDetails.location);
   }
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-12-18 15:02:38</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>eb44e63b474331107b748a5f746d4397</sys_id><sys_mod_count>1</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Autofill details onChange</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Finance Request" source="x_1178586_financ_0">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Finance Request">2194808c472231107b748a5f746d43fd</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_eb44e63b474331107b748a5f746d4397</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>kiril.shandaliuk</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-12-18 15:32:45</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>0</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Requester Information">735f5ab3474331107b748a5f746d43e7</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
